sense.def:
To react to something
pomeni, da se vedemo na določen način kot odgovor na nekaj, kar se nam je zgodilo.

seg.quote: She tends to react strongly if he lights a cigarette.

sense.def:
To react against the way other people behave
pomeni namerno se vesti drugače kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: They reacted against the formality of their predecessors.

sense.def:
To react to a drug
pomeni zboleti zaradi zdravila.

Kadar kemična snov
reacts with another chemical substance
, se spoji z drugo in tako nastane nova snov.
